title: I am a 16 year old teen and I'm good at math and science. How can I earn money online? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear Teenager, I would suggest continue your studies, excel at them. You have the whole life to earn money. Enjoy your teenage. If you’re good at it, learn how to get better. Try participating in the math olympiad or make a good science model. Excel at things you are good at.

you are a minor… concentrate only in your studies…. dont try to earn and think about money otherwise you could be in deep trouble… first finish your degree level education then think and ask about it..
